A Porcupine

March 18, 2025

An unfaithful porcupine for Islip, Had planned yet another business trip, Thinking he’d snuck away from his clueless lady, But she suspected something shady, She caught him with another in Miami drinking wine, she shouted “I knew you had another por-concubine!”
